definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: waking, or wakeful, one, i.e. angel (√[[עיר]], cf. Syr. 9or wake, 9iyr waking (PS:2843), JAram. [[עִיר]], NH [[עֵיר]] adj. awake);—abs. ´[[ע]]: Da 4:10, Da 4:20; pl. abs. [[עִירִין]] v:Da 4:14; Aq Symm. e)grh/gorov; cf. Charles:Enoch i. 5; xxxix. 12; also p. 356 Dr:ad loc.; doubtful is the connex. with Ph. Zophesemim (Euseb.:Praep. Evang. 10), i.e. [[חפי שמים]] watchers of heaven, as keeping watch over or spying out (Zim:KAT 3. 629 Jerem:Atim Licht d. AO 63).
